external_games.name: Nagato - Ninja Flying and Fighting Jungle Wars
Nagato - Ninja Flying and Fighting Jungle Wars

name: Nagato - Ninja Flying and Fighting Jungle Wars
storyline: Fujibayashi Nagato was a leader of the Iga ninjas during the 16th century, with his followers often fighting the daimyo of Oomi domain in their Jungle wars against Oda Nobunaga Ninja clans.This support for his opponents would later prompt “The Annunaki” to invade Earth and stamp out the ninja clans for good, but many of them went into hiding to preserve the culture.
summary: Enjoy fighting and flying all day as you train Nagato to defend his Ninja Clan through the Jungle wars.
